title: Train Sim World® 5: Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Expansion
description: Continue the story of Thomas’ visit to the West Somerset Railway with the Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Expansion! Sir Topham Hatt and Diesel are preparing to throw a surprise birthday celebration for Thomas, who has been given a special coat of paint!
longDescription:
Continue the story of Thomas and his friends’ visit to the West Somerset Railway with the Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Expansion! It’s time for the main event as Sir Topham Hatt and Diesel are preparing to throw a surprise birthday celebration for Thomas who, as a treat, has been given a very special and familiar new coat of paint!

*Note: Thomas & Friends™ Visit the West Somerset Railway is required for this expansion to work.*

Following the events of Thomas’ first full day on the West Somerset Railway, preparations are underway to celebrate Thomas’ birthday. Work with Diesel as he goes to collect The Troublesome Trucks filled with party supplies, but will they get up to their usual tricks?

As a special gift, Thomas has asked to be repainted for his birthday! Travel with Thomas around the West Somerset Railway in his Original Green Livery, complete with his original number 70 and white pinstripe lining. Be a really useful engine as you take passengers on Annie & Clarabel and help out when others are in need.

Train Sim World 5: Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Expansion continues the visit of Thomas and his friends to the West Somerset Railway with an additional 3-part narrated story. Use Free Roam to take Thomas in his original colours on a tour of the mainland, even visit his original hometown of Brighton! (East Coastway and London - Brighton available separately).

Join in the fun with the Thomas & Friends™ 80th Anniversary Expansion!

**Please Note: You must own Train Sim World 5: West Somerset Railway and Thomas & Friends™ Visit the West Somerset Railway which are available as separate purchases, or as a core bundle also containing Train Sim World 5: Training Center.**

# Key Features
- Continue the story with Thomas the Tank Engine and his friends on their visit to the West Somerset Railway
- This expansion adds Thomas in his Original Green Livery
- Play through an additional 3-part story on the West Somerset Railway, complete with narration and character interactions
- Take the tour anywhere, Original Green Thomas can travel on any route in your collection with Free Roam
- Scenario Planner and Formation Designer (with Thomas & Friends™ content only) compatible. Share your formations and scenarios with the Creators Club. Livery Designer is not supported
- Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
